result.name: ni_063_-_stability_of_placement_of_looked_after_children_-_length_of_placement
result.notes:
This indicator measures the percentage of looked after children aged under 16 at who have been looked after continuously for at least 2.5 years who were living in the same placement for at least 2 years, or are placed for adoption and their adoptive placement together with their previous placement together last for at least 2 years

Source: Statutory SSDA903 data collection from Local Authorities to DCSF.

Publisher: DCLG Floor Targets Interactive/ Department for Children Schools and Families (DCSF)

Geographies: County/Unitary Authority, Government Office Region (GOR), National

Geographic coverage: England

Time coverage: 2003/04 to 2008

Type of data: Administrative data

odi-certificate.title: NI 063 - Stability of placement of looked after children: length of placement

organization.name: department-for-children-schools-and-families
organization.title: Department for Children, Schools and Families
organization.description: DCFS is the department preceding DfE and its datasets are kept under the original name for historical purposes. Its datasets will surface in searches for DfE when the 'include sub-publishers' option is selected when searching from the DfE departmental page or when DfE is selected as a publisher in the filtering facets in the main search results page.
